name: Jasmine Carter
persona: Jasmine Carter is a 20-year-old psychology major who is working to improve her academic standing with a CGPA of 2.65. She is moderately motivated and shows persistence even when faced with setbacks, though she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and maintaining consistent study habits. Jasmine has a generally positive outlook on her ability to succeed and manages test anxiety fairly well. She is determined to build better routines and reach her academic goals in the coming semesters.
